005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.escaped.character.EscapedCharacterExtension;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.gfm.strikethrough.SubscriptExtension;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.superscript.SuperscriptExtension;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.tables.TablesExtension;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.typographic.TypographicExtension;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.ParserEmulationProfile;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataSet;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataSet;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.format.options.ListBulletMarker;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.misc.Extension;
023
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
030
031public final class FlexmarkConfiguration {
032
033  @NonNull
034  private static final ParserEmulationProfile PARSER_PROFILE = ParserEmulationProfile.COMMONMARK_0_29;
035
036  @NonNull
037  public static final DataSet FLEXMARK_CONFIG = initFlexmarkConfig();
038
039  @SuppressWarnings("null")
040  @NonNull
041  private static DataSet initFlexmarkConfig() {
042    MutableDataSet options = new MutableDataSet();
043    options.setFrom(PARSER_PROFILE);
044
045    List<Extension> extensions = List.of(
046        // Metaschema insert
047        InsertAnchorExtension.newInstance(),
048        // q tag handling
049        HtmlQuoteTagExtension.newInstance(),
050        TypographicExtension.create(),
051        TablesExtension.create(),
052        // fix for code handling
053        HtmlCodeRenderExtension.newInstance(),
054        // to ensure that escaped characters are not lost
055        EscapedCharacterExtension.create(),
056        SuperscriptExtension.create(),
057        SubscriptExtension.create()
058    // AutolinkExtension.create()
059    );
060    Parser.EXTENSIONS.set(options, extensions);
061
062    // AST processing expects this
063    Parser.FENCED_CODE_CONTENT_BLOCK.set(options, true);
064    // Parser.CODE_SOFT_LINE_BREAKS.set(options, true);
065    // Parser.PARSE_INNER_HTML_COMMENTS.set(options, true);
066    // Parser.HTML_BLOCK_COMMENT_ONLY_FULL_LINE.set(options, true);
067    // Parser.HTML_COMMENT_BLOCKS_INTERRUPT_PARAGRAPH.set(options, true);
068
069    // disable the built in processor, since we are configuring a patched one
070    Parser.ASTERISK_DELIMITER_PROCESSOR.set(options, false);
071
072    // configure GitHub-flavored tables
073    TablesExtension.COLUMN_SPANS.set(options, false);
074    TablesExtension.APPEND_MISSING_COLUMNS.set(options, true);
075    TablesExtension.DISCARD_EXTRA_COLUMNS.set(options, true);
076    TablesExtension.HEADER_SEPARATOR_COLUMN_MATCH.set(options, true);
077
078    // TypographicExtension.ENABLE_QUOTES.set(options, true); // default
079    TypographicExtension.ENABLE_SMARTS.set(options, false);
080    TypographicExtension.SINGLE_QUOTE_UNMATCHED.set(options, "'");
081    TypographicExtension.DOUBLE_QUOTE_OPEN.set(options, "\"");
082    TypographicExtension.DOUBLE_QUOTE_CLOSE.set(options, "\"");
083
084    Map<String, String> typographicReplacementMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
085    typographicReplacementMap.put("“", "\"");
086    typographicReplacementMap.put("”", "\"");
087    typographicReplacementMap.put("&ldquo;", "“");
088    typographicReplacementMap.put("&rdquo;", "”");
089    // typographicReplacementMap.put("‘", "'");
090    // typographicReplacementMap.put("’", "'");
091    typographicReplacementMap.put("&lsquo;", "‘");
092    typographicReplacementMap.put("&rsquo;", "’");
093    typographicReplacementMap.put("&apos;", "’");
094    // typographicReplacementMap.put("«", "<<");
095    typographicReplacementMap.put("&laquo;", "«");
096    // typographicReplacementMap.put("»", ">>");
097    typographicReplacementMap.put("&raquo;", "»");
098    // typographicReplacementMap.put("…", "...");
099    typographicReplacementMap.put("&hellip;", "…");
100    // typographicReplacementMap.put("–", "--");
101    typographicReplacementMap.put("&endash;", "–");
102    // typographicReplacementMap.put("—", "---");
103    typographicReplacementMap.put("&emdash;", "—");
104
105    FlexmarkHtmlConverter.TYPOGRAPHIC_REPLACEMENT_MAP.set(options, typographicReplacementMap);
106    FlexmarkHtmlConverter.OUTPUT_UNKNOWN_TAGS.set(options, true);
107    FlexmarkHtmlConverter.SETEXT_HEADINGS.set(options, false); // disable
108    // needed to ensure extra empty paragraphs are ignored
109    FlexmarkHtmlConverter.BR_AS_EXTRA_BLANK_LINES.set(options, false);
110
111    // FlexmarkHtmlConverter.RENDER_COMMENTS.set(options, true);
112    // FlexmarkHtmlConverter.ADD_TRAILING_EOL.set(options, false); // default
113
114    Formatter.MAX_TRAILING_BLANK_LINES.set(options, -1);
115    Formatter.LIST_BULLET_MARKER.set(options, ListBulletMarker.DASH);
116
117    HtmlRenderer.MAX_TRAILING_BLANK_LINES.set(options, -1);
118    HtmlRenderer.UNESCAPE_HTML_ENTITIES.set(options, true);
119    HtmlRenderer.PERCENT_ENCODE_URLS.set(options, true);
120    // HtmlRenderer.ESCAPE_HTML_COMMENT_BLOCKS.set(options, false); // default
121    // HtmlRenderer.SUPPRESS_HTML_COMMENT_BLOCKS.set(options, false); // default
122    // HtmlRenderer.SUPPRESS_INLINE_HTML_COMMENTS.set(options, false); // default
123    // HtmlRenderer.HARD_BREAK.set(options,"<br/>");
124
125    return options.toImmutable();
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Get a new flexmark configuration.
130   *
131   * @param options
132   *          the current set of options.
133   * @return the configuration
134   */
135  public static DataSet newFlexmarkConfig(@Nullable DataHolder options) {
136    return options == null ? FLEXMARK_CONFIG : DataSet.merge(FLEXMARK_CONFIG, options);
137  }
138
139  private FlexmarkConfiguration() {
140    // disable construction
141  }
142
143}
